name: Lucy's Levitation
summary: Lucy's Levitation is a ROMhack/mod of Super Mario 64. In this game, you progress through a mysterious temple collecting orbs to open doors. Features custom movement controls, new objects/assets, and an original soundtrack. Placed 4th in the Mario Jams Duality-themed competition.

videos.name: Release Date Trailer
videos.title: Lucy's Levitation: Available now on romhacking.com
